item.title: Vlan Configuration in Cisco Switches
item.description: Overview On Cisco switches, VLAN configuration is primarily performed at Layer 2 (switching) using VLAN databases and per-port VLAN assignment. Layer 3 VLAN routing is performed using SVI (Switched Virtual Interface) on Layer 3 switches or routers.
